social_work: Secured 5K INR for Project Cure of Humanity Welfare Council in Milaap through a fundraising campaign in July 2020.

projects.name: Dashboard for an Educational Institution
projects.description: Engineered a web app to manage student data, enhancing efficiency by 30%. Implemented features for data visualization and improving decision-making efficiency by 15%.

projects.name: Chatbot | Flower Shop Assistant
projects.description: Developed 'Heather', a chatbot using IBM Watson Assistant reducing customer service response time by 25%. Automated customer inquiries about store location, hours, and flower recommendations, saving 30 hours/week.

projects.name: Sentiment Analyzer
projects.description: Leveraged NLP techniques for textual data analysis, improving efficiency by 30%. Achieved 85% sentiment classification accuracy on a 10,000-review dataset.

experiences.description: Orchestrated over 100 drives for social causes such as education, animal welfare, plantation, medical booths, etc. Directed a team of 30+ research volunteers, streamlining project workflows and enhancing overall efficiency. Facilitated the Be Her Hero project, employing over 100 rural women through crochet work.
